question: Zoe and Ben noticed horses grazing in the pastures. Skip count backwards by 10s from 40 and fill in the missing numbers.
They saw rows of sheep in the distance. Skip count backwards by 10s from  42 and fill in the missing numbers.
The countryside was full of beautiful birds flying above. Skip count backwards by 10s from 97 and fill in the missing numbers.
On the trip, they saw small cottages scattered along the road. Skip count backwards by 10s from 155 and fill in the missing numbers.
During their ride, Zoe and Ben noticed windmills spinning on the hills. Skip count backwards by 10s from 199  and fill in the missing numbers.
